remarks: The predicate "is an ideal of the commutative ring ` R ` ." (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)
statement:
idlval.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
idlval.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
idlval.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
idlval.4 $e |- Z = ( GId ` G ) $.
isidlc $p |- ( R e. CRingOps -> ( I e. ( Idl ` R ) <-> ( I C_ X /\ Z e. I /\ A. x e. I ( A. y e. I ( x G y ) e. I /\ A. z e. X ( z H x ) e. I ) ) ) ) $.
$d I x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
$d X x z $.
